# Anomaly Detection: Local

## Project Outlines

### 1st Phase: Understanding and Planning
*  Ingest: done
*  Check (data quality): done
*  Prepare: done
*  Analyze (EDA or Statistical Testing)
*  Understand

### 2nd Phase: Training and Testing
*  Engineer (features)
*  Train Models
*  Evaluate
*  Build p-table
*  Inference
